column4: hello, i had a problem with the new ubuntu, i tryed to install it under windows 7, but after the restart theres no bootmanager where i can choose ubuntu.
windows boot directly, its like i never installed ubuntu, and yeah, i thought its work under windows 7 =(

I'd suspect incompatibility between Wubi and Windows 7. Considering that Windows 7 isn't all that different from its predecessor, the next logical step would be try to install Ubuntu alongside Windows 7.
